name: andrewjensen.com - Make this site suck less.
description: All i wanted to do was play Faceball 3000. What I ended up doing instead was CSS work to improve a crappy web site.
additional_info: Information This website has a lot of web games. Because some people (read: EVERYBODY) might not like the bright red background, I created this style to address this small corner of the web so people can have more fun playing what they want from this website. The changes this style provides are in the spirit of the author's intended look, so it's still a red background, albeit a dark red one. Updates 12/19/15 When proginally published, I forgot to limit the reach of the style so it made all of background red and all of font white, no matter where you went. Resolved.
